Alice.note_to_self: Alice: Placed road at 20-19. First settlement at 20 (W11, B6, S8). Second settlement priority: Wheat/Ore. Target Nodes: 42 (Wh9, O5) or 41 (O5, Wh9, B10).

Bob.note_to_self: My first settlement at 42 is a Wheat/Ore powerhouse. I'm heading toward Node 41 to eventually reach the Wood Port at 40 and the Brick/Wood at 31. My second settlement MUST target Node 12 (W3, B6, S5) or Node 5 (W4, S8, B6) to get consistent Wood/Brick/Sheep production. Alice already has Wood/Brick/Sheep, so I need to secure my share before Charlie takes the remaining good spots.

Charlie.note_to_self: Placed first settlement on Node 12 (B6, S5, W3). Need to secure Wheat and Ore in the second round. Targets: Node 25 (Wh8, S4, O3) or Node 35 (Wh6, S11, O3). Keep an eye on Alice's expansion toward the Brick/Sheep area.
